meanings.sent1: The talkers in the room were all sharing stories.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to talkers who have interesting things to say.
meanings.sent3: The talkers at the party kept everyone entertained with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed effortlessly, making her a natural talker.
meanings.sent5: The talkers in the crowd made it lively and engaging.

meanings.definition: A device or software that converts speech into text.
meanings.sent1: The talkers in the meeting helped transcribe the discussions.
meanings.sent2: I rely on talkers to assist me in converting audio files into written documents.
meanings.sent3: The talkers on my phone make it easier for me to send messages quickly.
meanings.sent4: The talker accurately captured every word spoken during the interview.
meanings.sent5: Using the talker, I was able to create written notes from the recorded lecture.

meanings.definition: A group of people engaged in conversation.
meanings.sent1: The talkers in the cafe were discussing the latest news.
meanings.sent2: I joined the talkers at the park to chat about our weekend plans.
meanings.sent3: The talkers in the office always have lively debates during lunch.
meanings.sent4: The talkers in the classroom were eager to share their opinions.
meanings.sent5: The talkers in the book club had diverse perspectives on the novel.
